content.rendered:
Gary is a BEng qualified Naval Architect, Chartered Engineer and a Member of the Royal Institution of Naval Architects. He started his career as an apprentice in a British Shipyard, then spent 25 years with Lloyd’s Register starting as Surveyor in their European offices. He was also a Lead Technical Trainer of surveyors in China and is IOSH qualified. On departing Lloyd’s Register in 2013, he spent three years as an independent Marine Consultant, with two years engaged in LNG ship new construction supervision in Korea, followed by one year of Marine Consulting and Marine Training.

Contact

Hong Kong | +852 9829 9230

Discipline: Engineer / Naval Architect
Specialism: Naval Architecture, New construction, Class survey and Marine Casualty Investigations
Expert Witness Expertise: Expert opinion
